title: Drawing, "Design for a Dixie Cup", ca. 1970
medium: Pen and colored inks on bright white paper, taped to a sheet of bright white paper
description: Semicircular sheet with two registers of alternating red tulips and blue daisies punctuated with the phrases "smile" "hello!" and "have a nice day".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Dixie Cup", ca. 1970.
ca. 1970. Pen and colored inks on bright white paper, taped to a sheet of bright white paper. Gift of Irv Koons. 2011-1-7.
